title: Breath of life
creator_credit: Wilson A. Craig and Electricity Commission of New South Wales (N.S.W.)
brief_description: Demonstrates mouth to mouth resuscitation in case of electric shock. Also demonstrates Halter-Neilson method of moving arms if mouth to mouth is impossible.
